xwikidoc.comment: Added conditions to show add resource link

property.content:
##
## ## the default expandation state for categories #set($defstate=false) ## #beginNavigationPanel($msg.get("panel.navigation.home.rollover")) ## ## ## ##FIND ## #set($rot = $msg.get("panel.navigation.find.rollover")) #navigationCategory($msg.get('panel.navigation.find'), $rot, "", $defstate, [ [$msg.get('panel.navigation.find.about'), "Main.AboutFindingCollecting"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.featured_resources'), "Main.FeaturedContent"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.browse_by_subject'), "Main.Browse"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.advanced_search'), "/xwiki/bin/view/Search/#o%3Af%3Do%253Aresource%253Do%25253Aterms%25253Ds%2525253Aenter%25252520search%25252520terms%25255Esince%25253Ds%2525253A20080825%25255Eother%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubjectparent%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubject%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Ereview%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elevel%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elanguage%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Especial%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Eictprfx%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Eict%25253Ds%2525253A%255Egroup%253Do%25253Aterms%25253Ds%2525253Aenter%25252520search%25252520terms%25255Esince%25253Ds%2525253A20080825%25255Eother%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubjectparent%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubject%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elevel%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elanguage%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Epolicy%25253Ds%2525253A%255Emember%253Do%25253Aterms%25253Ds%2525253Aenter%25252520search%25252520terms%25255Esince%25253Ds%2525253A20080825%25255Eother%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubjectparent%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubject%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Emember_type%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Ecountry%25253Ds%2525253A%255Eblog%253Do%25253Aterms%25253Ds%2525253Aenter%25252520search%25252520terms%25255Esince%25253Ds%2525253A20080825%25255Eother%25253Ds%2525253A%255Ecurriki%253Do%25253Aterms%25253Ds%2525253Aenter%25252520search%25252520terms%25255Esince%25253Ds%2525253A20080825%25255Eother%25253Ds%2525253A%5Ep%3Do%253Aresource%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Egroup%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Emember%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Eblog%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Ecurriki%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%5Et%3Ds%253Asearch-resource-tab%5Ea%3Do%253Aresource%253Do%25253Aa%25253Db%2525253A1%255Egroup%253Do%25253Aa%25253Db%2525253A1"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.reviewed_resources'), "/xwiki/bin/view/Search/#o%3As%3Ds%253Aresource%5Ef%3Do%253Aresource%253Do%25253Asubjectparent%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubject%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Ereview%25253Ds%2525253Ahighest_rated%25255Elevel%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elanguage%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Especial%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Eictprfx%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Eict%25253Ds%2525253A%255Egroup%253Do%25253Asubjectparent%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubject%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elevel%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elanguage%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Epolicy%25253Ds%2525253A%255Emember%253Do%25253Asubjectparent%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubject%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Emember_type%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Ecountry%25253Ds%2525253A%255Eblog%253Do%25253A%255Ecurriki%253Do%25253A%5Ep%3Do%253Aresource%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Egroup%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Emember%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Eblog%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Ecurriki%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%5Et%3Ds%253Asearch-resource-tab%5Ea%3Do%253Aresource%253Do%25253Aa%25253Db%2525253A1%255Egroup%253Do%25253Aa%25253Db%2525253A1%255Emember%253Do%25253Aa%25253Db%2525253A1"] ] ) ## ##CONTRIBUTE ## #set($rot = $msg.get("panel.navigation.contribute.rollover")) #if($context.user=="XWiki.XWikiGuest") #navigationCategory($msg.get('panel.navigation.contribute'), $rot,"", $defstate, [ [$msg.get('panel.navigation.contribute.about'), "Main.AboutContributing"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.addresource'), "/xwiki/bin/login/XWiki/XWikiLogin?xredirect=$xwiki.getURL($doc.fullName)", $msg.get("panel.navigation.addresource.rollover.visitor")], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.crs'), "Main.AboutCurrikiReviewSystem"] ] ) #elseif($request.viewer && ($request.viewer=="assetedit" || $request.viewer=="infoedit")) #navigationCategory($msg.get('panel.navigation.contribute'), $rot,"", $defstate, [ [$msg.get('panel.navigation.contribute.about'), "Main.AboutContributing"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.crs'), "Main.AboutCurrikiReviewSystem"] ] ) #else #navigationCategory($msg.get('panel.navigation.contribute'), $rot,"", $defstate, [ [$msg.get('panel.navigation.contribute.about'), "Main.AboutContributing"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.addresource'), "javascript:Curriki.module.addpath.startPath('B');", $msg.get("panel.navigation.addresource.rollover.member")], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.crs'), "Main.AboutCurrikiReviewSystem"] ] ) #end ## ##CONNECT ## #set($rot=$msg.get("panel.navigation.connect.rollover")) #navigationCategory($msg.get('panel.navigation.connect'), $rot,"", $defstate, [ [$msg.get('panel.navigation.connect.about'), "Main.AboutConnecting"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.featuredGroups'), "Main.FeaturedGroups"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.browseGroups'), "Groups.Browse"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.createGroup'), "Groups.AboutCreatingGroups"] ] ) ## ##MY CURRIKI ##OLD [$msg.get('panel.navigation.myprofile'), "$context.user"], #set($rot=$msg.get("panel.navigation.mycurriki.rollover")) #set($suser = $context.user.replaceAll("XWiki.","")) #if(!$isguest) #navigationCategory($msg.get('panel.navigation.mycurriki'), $rot,"", $defstate, [ [$msg.get('panel.navigation.myprofile'), "MyCurriki.Profile"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.myfavorites'), "MyCurriki.Favorites"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.mycontributors'),"MyCurriki.Contributions"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.mycollection'), "MyCurriki.Collections"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.myblogs'), "MyCurriki.Blog"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.mygroups'), "MyCurriki.Groups"] ] ) #end ## ## ##PARTNERS & SPONSORS #set($rot = $msg.get("panel.navigation.partners_sponsers.rollover")) #navigationCategory($msg.get('panel.navigation.partners_sponsers'), $rot,"", $defstate, [ [$msg.get('panel.navigation.partners'), "Main.Partners"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.sponsors'), "Main.Sponsors"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.featured_partners'), "Main.FeaturedPartners"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.partner_content'), "/xwiki/bin/view/Search/#o%3As%3Ds%253Aresource%5Ef%3Do%253Aresource%253Do%25253Asubjectparent%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubject%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Ereview%25253Ds%2525253Apartners%25255Elevel%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elanguage%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Especial%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Eictprfx%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Eict%25253Ds%2525253A%255Egroup%253Do%25253Asubjectparent%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubject%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elevel%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Elanguage%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Epolicy%25253Ds%2525253A%255Emember%253Do%25253Asubjectparent%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Esubject%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Emember_type%25253Ds%2525253A%25255Ecountry%25253Ds%2525253A%255Eblog%253Do%25253A%255Ecurriki%253Do%25253A%5Ep%3Do%253Aresource%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Egroup%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Emember%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Eblog%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%255Ecurriki%253Do%25253Ac%25253Dn%2525253A0%25255Es%25253Dn%2525253A25%5Et%3Ds%253Asearch-resource-tab%5Ea%3Do%253Aresource%253Do%25253Aa%25253Db%2525253A1%255Egroup%253Do%25253Aa%25253Db%2525253A1%255Emember%253Do%25253Aa%25253Db%2525253A1"] ] ) ## ##HELP #set($rot=$msg.get("panel.navigation.help.rollover")) #navigationCategory($msg.get('panel.navigation.help'), $rot,"", $defstate, [ [$msg.get('panel.navigation.help_collection'), "Coll_curriki.CurrikiHelp"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.tutorials'), "Coll_curriki.Tutorials"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.contact_us'), "Main.Contact"] ] ) ## ## ##ABOUT CURRIKI #set($rot=$msg.get("panel.navigation.about_curriki.rollover")) #navigationCategory($msg.get('panel.navigation.about_curriki'), $rot,"", $defstate, [ [$msg.get('panel.navigation.guided_overview'), "Main.About"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.guided_tour'), "javascript:tourpop();"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.news'), "News.WebHome"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.faqs'), "Main.FAQ"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.board'), "Main.Board"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.leadership_team'), "Main.Leadership"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.volunteer'), "Main.Volunteer"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.donate'), "Main.Donate"], [$msg.get('panel.navigation.link'), "Main.Link"] ] ) ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## #endNavigationPanel() ## ##

property.description: Provides links to the different Curriki areas.
